pages.text: Lionfish is a hostile mob that can be found near coral in warm and unfrozen oceans.$(br2)If you are near of them, they will inflict Nausea and Poison effects to you.$(br2)On death they drop Raw Lionfish. They can be cooked to get Cooked Lionfish, can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/repellence)Potion of Repellence$(/l). They may drop Bone Meal too.
They can be captured in a Bucket, which can be used as a trap in a Dispenser.
